column4: I've set up my new monitor and its running 1680x1050 just fine, xorg.conf is up to speed and I ran the xserver setup to adjust anything. But for some reason, when I try to play a movie, or start a game. the program closes; for instance VLC closes right after I load a movie into it. Can anyone help?
if you start vlc or something from a terminal, is there any output when the program closes? or anything in your X log?
